Sched::RedistributionCallback

Sched::RedistributionCallback Class Reference

RedistributionCallback is used to signal Callbacks given in the LocalCollection once all messages with a given data are sent. More...

Detailed Description

RedistributionCallback is used to signal Callbacks given in the LocalCollection once all messages with a given data are sent.
